gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Lakers 123, Grizzlies 120
gameRecap.excerpt: The Lakers defeated the Grizzlies, 123-120. LeBron James (37 points, nine rebounds, five assists) and Anthony Davis (36 points, 14 rebounds, five assists) combine for 73 points for the Lakers, with Rui Hachimura adding 14 points and five rebounds in the victory. Jake LaRavia tallied 28 points, six assists, and three rebounds for the Grizzlies in the losing effort. The Lakers improve to 46-35, while the Grizzlies fall to 27-54.
